summary: Completed comprehensive testing of signup flow. Backend registration API works correctly, form interactions are fully functional, but discovered critical React hooks error in dashboard component preventing successful completion of signup flow.

minor_issues.impact: Profile endpoint not available, but doesn't affect signup flow

working_correctly.status: WORKING - Returns 201 status code and creates user successfully
WORKING - Demo login successful with token generation

critical_bugs.issue: React hooks error: 'Rendered more hooks than during the previous render'
critical_bugs.impact: CRITICAL - Prevents dashboard from loading, breaking signup flow completion
critical_bugs.details: Dashboard shows error screen instead of user interface, preventing successful signup completion
critical_bugs.error_message: Something went wrong - Rendered more hooks than during the previous render

ui_working_correctly.status: WORKING - Page loads successfully at /signup with proper form layout
WORKING - All fields including previously problematic date/SSN fields now work correctly
WORKING - Password strength indicator shows 'Good' and validates requirements properly
WORKING - Can be clicked via label, overlay issues resolved
WORKING - Submit button exists and is functional, form data gets processed

routing_issues.issue: TanStack Router shows 'Not Found' fallback when dashboard component crashes
routing_issues.impact: Users see generic error instead of proper dashboard after successful signup

passed_tests: Backend health check responds correctly (200 OK)
User registration API endpoint works (POST /api/auth/register returns 201)
All protected API endpoints (accounts, transactions, KYC) return 200 status
All form fields accept input correctly (name, email, password, mobile, DOB, SSN, address)
Terms checkbox interaction works via label click
Submit button is present and functional
Form validation and field interactions are fully resolved from previous iteration

success_percentage.backend: 85.7% - All critical APIs functional, minor profile endpoint issue
success_percentage.frontend: 80% - Form completely functional, but dashboard component has critical React error

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL PRIORITY: Fix React hooks error in dashboard component. The error 'Rendered more hooks than during the previous render' prevents dashboard from loading after successful signup. This is likely caused by conditional hook usage or state management issues in the dashboard component. The signup form and backend are working correctly - the issue is purely in the dashboard component rendering.
